text: Aydin Ali oglu Ibrahimov (; September 17, 1938 - September 2, 2021) was a Soviet-born Azerbaijani wrestler. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal. He was born in Kirovabad, Azerbaijan SSR. Ibrahimov died on September 2, 2021 in Baku, Azerbaijan of COVID-19, two weeks before his 83rd birthday.Well-known sportsman Aydin Ibrahimov died of coronavirus ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Azerbaijani wrestlers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Azerbaijan Category:21st-century Azerbaijani people Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Aydin Ibrahimov
